comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Elsie Sutan is probably Elsie Sutton, mentioned as a swimmer with Martha Hagstadt and Edna Cole in a 1915 article in the New York Tribune: chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn83030214/1915-07-25/ed-... They were endurance swimmers associated with the National Women's Lifesaving League. Elsie Sutton and Martha Hagstadt (or Hagstedt) are mentioned as being from Brooklyn in several newspaper stories.
